BR_text.BRsummary: CVAT new UI: "hold Ctrl" in new UI
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
 
 
  Read/searched the docs
  Searched past issues
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
 
 Have a shortcut for quick editing of polygons without selecting adjacent ones
 <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
 
 In the old UI it was possible to hold Сtrl on the object and move the points, but in the new UI it does not work, since Ctrl + click is to delete a point.
 In the example, you need to move point down
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54434686/89877113-4d987280-dbc8-11ea-9baa-3b81b7c554bf.gif></denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
 
 Maybe replace holding Ctrl with holding Alt
 <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
 
 
 Hold Ctrl for quick polygon editing
 Try to move point
 Point removed
